WorkItem.ClosedComment: We determined this is a problem in the MySQL plugin.
WorkItem.Description:
Visual Studio 2012 Pro with MySQL Visual Studio 1.0.2 plugin installed breaks TypeScript 0.9.1.1 intellisense. 

I had the MySQL plugin installed with the previous TypeScript version 0.9.1 and had no problems with the intellisense. Once I upgraded to 0.9.1.1 the intellisense did not work at all. If you hover over instance methods it will correctly identify it, but when you type out a module or class, or even use '.' after an instance of a class, no suggestions pops up.

Once MySQL plugin was uninstalled intellisense works again.
WorkItem.Summary: MySQL Visual Studio plugin breaks TypeScript intellisense
